      • ReadInitialEntiresFromFile

        public void ReadInitialEntiresFromFile()
        Read initial entries from file m_strPhoneBookFileName, construct ECBEntries and initialize the m_alEntries.

      • ReadInstructionsFromFile

        public void ReadInstructionsFromFile()
        Read instructions from file m_strInstructionFileName, call corresponding functions to modify the elements in m_alEntries.

      • SaveOutputFile

        public void SaveOutputFile()
        After all the instructions are processed, save the resulting m_alEntries into file m_strOutputFileName.

      • QueryEntry

        private java.util.ArrayList<ECBEntry> QueryEntry​(java.lang.String strCategory,
                                                 java.lang.String strContent)
        Query. Parse the recording from file m_strInstructionFileName as the input.
        Parameters:
        strCategory - name, birthday, phone, address, email.
        strContent - content to match.
        Returns:
        array list that contains all the matched contacts.

      • AddEntry

        private void AddEntry​(java.lang.String strInfo)
        Add. Parse the recording from file m_strInstructionFileName as the input.
        Parameters:
        strInfo - String that contains the contact's information, which will be provided to the ECBEntry's constructor.

      • DeleteEntry

        private void DeleteEntry​(java.lang.String strInfo)
        Delete. Parse the recording from file m_strInstructionFileName as the input.
        Parameters:
        strInfo - String that contains the contact's information. If match in m_alEntries is found, it will be deleted from m_alEntries.

      • SortList

        private void SortList​(java.util.ArrayList<ECBEntry> alTarget,
                      java.lang.String strCategory)
        Sort an ECBEntries array list according to certain category.
        Parameters:
        alTarget - Target array list.
        strCategory - name, birthday, phone, address, email.
